entry.title: Stable Channels - peer-to-peer dollar balances on Lightning
entry.summary: Communicating engineering trade-offs to users presents an ongoing challenge that necessitates the use of careful language. It's crucial for users to be well-informed so they can make educated choices in an open market filled with a variety of options. This market includes self-custodial Lightning systems and custodial systems like ecash, each offering different benefits and considerations. The goal is to ensure users have the information needed to navigate these options effectively, fostering competition and variety within the market.
